metadata.title: Does the RA6M5 support SPI mode for OctaRAM? Or only DOPI mode?

sections.content:
Question:
Does the RA6M5 support SPI mode for OctaRAM? Or only DOPI mode?
Answer:
The RA6M4/M5 OSPI controller only support DOPI mode for OctaRAM.
Suitable Products
RA6M4, RA6M5
  日本語
